document.full_text: nursing home operator skilled healthcare group inc said late monday that it was exploring strategic alternatives, including a potential sale of the company, sending its shares up about 14 percent to a year high.
document.title: skilled healthcare says may sell itself, shares up
lines_and_colors: nursing home operator skilled healthcare group inc said late monday that it was exploring strategic alternatives, including a potential sale of the company, sending its shares up about 14 percent to a year high.
